decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal">In the absence of a Noise Report, the proposal has failed to
demonstrate&nbsp;that the existing&nbsp;air conditioning units do&nbsp;not
result in undue noise impacts on the occupiers of the adjoining properties
No.38 and No.40 College Avenue, to the detriment of their residential amenities.&nbsp;
The proposal is therefore contrary to&nbsp;the National Planning Policy
Framework (2023), Policy D3 D.7 and D14 of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021) and Policy
DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class="MsoNormal">The existing single storey rear extension&nbsp;by reason of
its siting, height and rearward projection results in a loss of outlook,
overshadowing and an&nbsp;overbearing development to the occupiers of No.40
College Avenue, to the detriment of their residential amenities, contrary to
the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 D.7 of The&nbsp;
London Plan (2021),&nbsp;Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management
Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document:
Residential Design Guide (2010).<o:p></o:p></p>
description:
Single storey front extension incorporating front porch; single storey 
side extension; single storey rear extension with roof canopies and 
raised parapet to side; installation of AC unit to first floor rear 
(demolition of car port and porch) (part retrospective)
